name: Water slide Adventure 3D Sim
description:
Are you ready for Water slide Adventure 3D Sim? It’s summer season and you should enjoy water slide with hurdles and enjoy the Water slide Adventure 3D Sim. In this game you will start different slides and enjoy.
It becomes more interesting when you face loops, hurdles and player is totally at risk. A small mistake can create such a big problem. Avoid hurdles to save the life and reach to the next level. Every next level is more challenging than previous. Have a look at edges in order to avoid falling.
There is no space for even a minor mistake. A small mistake can create big problem for you. New challenges at every level provide an opportunity to polish your skills more. Now you have fun without leaving your home and going outside. It is an amusing and stimulating game with challenging Objectives.
feature:
Beautiful Environment.
Different camera view.
Challenging level.
Stunning HD Graphics.
